trends: There has been one other sighting in Whitley City
There were no other sightings in Whitley City on or around December 20th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsA ten year old girl playing with her new video camera that she had received for her birthday films a forty second video that shows a possible UFO. It starts with the camera on her. You can catch a couple of sights of it while she is still on the porch. She the walks off the porch. As she is walking she points the camera toward the rising sun. There appears to be a saturn shaped object hovering low. It does not appear to make any noise. The video has already been sent to MUFON by west.christopher@gmail.com.
Summary: Youn girl playing with video camera catches possible UFO.
